website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, if you need a waterproof case for an iPhone 6 or 6s with a high degree of reliability, this is the one to get.
pros: Provides a trim, waterproof fit for the iPhone 6 and 6s that is reliable to about 6.6'
Owners are happy with the underwater photo quality it allows
cons: Reports of some of the cutouts not lining up have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case, it’s definitely waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great case, it’s waterproof for sure, I took it to the pool and dropped it in the deep end, 5 feet deep and I was laying on the bottom listening to Spotify. The wrist band that comes with the phone is super convenient, I thought it was tacky at first but I tried it and I’ve yet to drop my phone. The only thing I’ve noticed.... I don’t know if it’s due to the case or the water pressure, but the phone doesn’t register my touch on the screen when I try to tap or slide it. But I just do what I have to do before I go under. I highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Love the strap
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around for waterproof cases with hand straps and this was the first one i came upon. Iv been using at at the public pool and local beaches the past week and its all worth it, no worries about any sort of moister getting inside. Obviously with any sort of case you gotta keep an eye on it for wear and tear but over all 5*
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Decent case!
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to work well with it and it passed the 30 minute water test. Haven’t had a chance to fully test the shock-proof, but we’ll see! Update: I’ve brought it down too 4 stars because every time someone calls me I have to yell into the bottom, with the charger port cover open or take off the case completely. I guess this is the price to pay for a secure phone.
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone 6 waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: In the past I had 2 phones ruined due to water damage. Since I started using the waterproof case, I haven't lost any phones from water or drop damage and have save my phone multiple time. I do recommend testing their water tight integrity once a month. One time I discovered the case was letting moisture creep in. I contacted OUNNE and they replaced it right away. The price is reasonable and it cheaper than spending money on a new phone.Overall I think it a great product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: McNeese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an active 18yo. He’s very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Well as an waterproof case it works , I used it at our vacation in Hawaii but there are annoying things along with a complete cover. The finger scan area is not responsive half the time and I notice the phone gets hot faster when it is on use constantly.
customer_reviews.author: ai chan1

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to disassemble without causing damage to waterproof capability
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to disassemble without causing damage to waterproof seal capability, I had to file the edges to get the case to re-assemble. Both the front and back are made of a thick-film-like material and the sides (the perimeter) are of a heavier plastic material which shields the phone. These days, it is difficult to find a quality iPhone 6 case so I will have to keep looking. Bottom line, if you never need to remove your iPhone 6 from this case, then it could be good for you, too bad the design does not allow for trouble-free reassembly.
customer_reviews.author: EbbTide

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 lifeproof cases and both failed me and waterlogged my phone, I realized that their cases aren’t actually poorly designed and have many flaws. however this case far surpasses lifeproof in water proof durability. I feel like i can trust this case to protect my phone. It also feels durable and like it will last. the little wii strap included didn’t last long tho but I think i’ll just get use an actual wii strap. Overall I would give this case a 99/100 because of the strap but other than that, it’s a perfect case with a sleek design
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I tested it for 30 minutes and it worked- it leaked in the ocean and my phone died
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened as I tested it in the sink for 30 minutes but I guess snorkeling in the ocean in Mexico is different and it leaked and it killed my phone. I wouldn't use a "waterproof" case again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 6S case. I previously owned a Lifeproof case for another phone but the price point was just high. The Ounne case was reasonably priced and the quality appears to be good on first impression. I did the waterproof test first and the case was indeed watertight. The screen remained responsive even as I kept the Rhinoshield screen protector on. The port covers are attached so less chance of losing them. I would have given it 5 stars but most aftermarket lightning charger do not fit, the size would have to be similar to the original Apple to work
customer_reviews.author: KAYE

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting yor phone from liquids on the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this case for my iPhone 6. I work in a place where I have to regularly sterilize what I carry and this case protects my phone from alcohol and other liquid disinfectants used on the job. No more worries about damaging my phone having it go for a dive in a sink full of soap suds. I see some people have complaints about the fingerprint reader. Well, you might want to redo your fingerprint settings since this does change how it reads from not having a cover over the sensor when you first set it up that way BEFORE you put it in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I bought this as an added layer of protection for my phone. Previously, the waterproof lanyard pouch I bout leaked. This year, it happened again. It wasn’t a fluke. Thankfully I had this case on it too. No water got into it, even though water got into the pouch. The only negative is that people I call can’t hear me very well when it is on. Because I was using it on vacation, going in and out of the water, it didn’t makes sense to keep taking it in and off. It’s a very secure fit, so it was too much of a hassle to try to remove. But the sound quality on my end was fine.
customer_reviews.author: LAETESIA L IBLE

customer_reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY. SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I hate how the buttons on the side of the phone are impossible to press unless you have it at the perfect angle! I have to literally press so hard that my fingers hurt. Not really the best. Oh and it’s also like impossible to take off the phone without hurting yourself. EDIT: this phone is trash. It’s not even been a full year and the power button has fell off, the charge port fell off, the auxiliary fell off, and the fingerprint scanner doesn’t even recognize my fingerprint. I have to literally take my phone off for it to recognize my fingerprint. I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS A 0 OUT OF 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I use pop sockets on all of my phones, I also put a dab or two of super glue to ensure it is completely attached. It's worked perfectly with every other case I've owned but the surface of the back of this case does not hold and now not only am I unable to use a pop socket there is super glue smeared all over the back of the case. what a waste! I should've just thrown $23 down the toilet instead
customer_reviews.author: Steve - Santa Cruz CA

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a really good case haven’t had a chance to try out the waterproof feature or the drop proof features yet though. The only complain I have is the charging port I can not use my extended charger I have to use the shorter factory charger but that’s a minor complaint. I also found out that I can not use headphones that plug in the plug on is to short.
customer_reviews.author: Aussy08

customer_reviews.title: Looking to keep phone dry when riding my motorcycle in rainy weather
customer_reviews.text: The case is great, but for the second time, it did not come with the audio adapter. The adapter is pictured and was supposed to be included. I had to request a return only because I need the adapter. There was no option to contact seller to ask if it could be sent. I am hoping to just get the adapter and not have to return the case. Secondly, every time I seal the phone in the case it moves my top left switch to mute. Having trouble getting it to not switch to mute when sealing the case.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The phone functions in this case, no more beating on the key pad.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case. Very durable and I don't have to beat on it to use the phones functions. It reads the finger id., and when typing it is sensitive enough to type what I press on. Plus water proof, which is nice since I have to be outside in all kinds of weather and like to Paddle Board too. My only wish is that it would come in more colors but not worth marking OUNNE IPhone 6/6s case down. I would highly recommend the case and think it is better then a Otterbox case.
customer_reviews.author: tubber D

customer_reviews.title: Caution - Charge Cord Connectors may not Fit.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this principally for its water resistance because she has at least on two occasions dropped her phone into a pool. It certainly appears to be a robust product capable of doing the job provided one is diligent at plugging the charge and headphone openings when not in use. For myself, I find the case bulky and heavy and many charge cord connectors do not fit. Probably the best indicator is that after a short period of time my wife stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ed

customer_reviews.title: 4 days of pool parties, beach, and spilling alcohol.. my phone lives
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of such a cheap iPhone case at first. But let me tell you it does the trick and does it well. I spent the past 4 days in Miami. Nonstop pool parties (this phone spent hours fully submerged in my pocket), fell from a decent height down the stairs and spent some time in the ocean as well. This case was able to withstand everything like a charm. Using the phone was still as easy as without the case, and the sound quality was still decent when talking to people.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Case is made from cheap plastic, feels like over time it will easily scratch. 2. Does not fit the phone, too loose front to back and when you try to squeeze the buttons you have to put so much pressure that it wrinkles the front of the case (as shown in the pic) and makes a great crinkle sound. ...and yes it is the right model for the phone, all of the buttons and holes line up. 3. Charging port area is too small for most charging cords, so in order to charge the phone, I have to completely remove it from the case. 4. It probably is waterproof, but I don't think I'm gonna test it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Olson

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to listen to music or charge phone with case on. The charger wont connect or earpiece portion. Too much space in between the case. I have to tske the case off to listen to music and charge. Dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS WORTHLESS PRODUCT. Complete and utter waste of money. Worthless garbage. Broke within 2 minutes after taken out of the package when I was trying to put this on my phone. You’re better off buying a ziplock bag. Thanks for nothing OUNNE
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for about three months now, it’s great! I replaced my life proof nuud case with this one as the nuud is no longer available. This case is holding up well and does not hinder the microphone or speaker on my phone as some waterproof cases do. The only drawback is the charging port is not a click tab, a rubber press cover that is sometimes difficult to open. However in order to have waterproof assurance I can accept this one thing
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to lifeproof cases
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was continuing to run into issues with lifeproof cases not sealing and the price tag. For the money, definitely the best waterproof case I've owned. Haven't actually tested it underwater, bought it more to keep it dry and protected. It can be a little hard to talk through sometimes but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: triickma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble but worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof case's manufacturers don't leave anything to chance. Their first instructions are for testing the case with a piece of paper (not the phone) inside. The only problem is, it's so hard to take apart (because it's securely closed), I thought I might never get to put the phone in! Thankfully I did finally get it open, insert the phone, and start using it. As soon as I did, I started to give in to buyer's remorse - but I also immediately had a bad day with various liquids upended all over the phone. It stayed completely dry, and I am certain now that it was worth the money and effort!
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: The design is not good
customer_reviews.text: Every time I put the phone in the case it would push the button on silent. No matter how I turned the dial it would push it to silent. Because I didn’t have another case and didn’t want to risk my husband taking the phone without one Ipulled the button off. Guess I will have to be buying another type of case
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Case doesn’t work with iPhone 6s!
customer_reviews.text: Update: case does not really fit the iPhone 6s. The hole for the power cord does not work when I have the case on and I have tried for five power cords. It works perfectly without the case on the phone. I saw someone else had the same problem as I am having.
customer_reviews.author: Angelworld

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good case.
customer_reviews.text: I received the case in a timely manner. It was easy to put the phone in. This phone case is for my husband, a truck driver who hauls sand, gravel, and logs. He is frequently in an out of the truck. He felt he needed a little extra protection from the elements and dirt for his iphone 6s. So far he like the feel of this case and we are hoping it will keep his phone protected.
customer_reviews.author: mld

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this case!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this case and regret buying it. First, no one can hear me when I'm talking with this case on. Second, the touch screen doesn't work well. Third, I have to take the case off to charge the phone because my aftermarket charger can't fit in the charging port. It is waterproof and does protect the phone from drops, but I am not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a much abused Lifeproof FRE case. Looks like it seals up pretty good. Passed the water test with flying colors. I don't much care for the plastic on the front and back. Very 'glossy', reflects like crazy. It also shows every smudge and fingerprint. I also don't care much for the ringer off/on 'dial'. We'll see how it works long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great case but hard to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Phone fits perfectly inside. Touch screen and fingerprint works well. The only complaint is the case was hard to remove and the white cloth included left fuzz on the screen. I had to remove it when I noticed white fuzz on the inside of the screen from cleaning it with the white cloth that was included in the kit. Once I got the fuzz cleaned off, the case is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky D.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because I really wanted a waterproof case which I believe this is, but EVERYONE I called couldn’t hear me and it’s not compatible with most chargers and requires an extension for headphones. I’m sure all these factors lead it to be waterproof but it also renders useless and nearly unfunctional for everything I use it for
customer_reviews.author: Elayna Weems

customer_reviews.title: Water proof at best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case in January this year. This the inside get dust in it. If you talk on the often this also isn’t for you people can only hear you if you have headphones in. Also while using this case my phone cracked. I would not call this case shock proof. I’ve had my phone for over 3 years never had any issues, with any other cases. I wish I would have spend the extra money to get the REAL deal life proof instead of this. Now I had to get a new phone because I couldn’t stand the crack in my screen.
customer_reviews.author: abbyring

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof case for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my old iPhone 6. The case fits well and was easy to install. It passed the 30 minute submerged waterproof test. I have not tested the impact test. It’s not too bulky for what it is. My only negative is the screen cover does not lay completely flat against the iPhone screen. It does operate as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Douggery

customer_reviews.title: Beats Zagg
customer_reviews.text: The complete enclosure works better than the partial protection I got from Zagg's shock protection, which wore out quickly. Dust used to get under it (Zagg) and scour the back of my iPhone. This works much better. It is completely encloused and and the water resistance is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springs

customer_reviews.title: Great case but has a big flaw!
customer_reviews.text: It’s like a life proof case but half the price. I was impressed with the case until I had to talk to people on it. No one could under stand me and said I sounded muffled and like I was speaking under water. In order for someone to understand me I had to put them on speaker phone and talk directly into the microphone. Unless the company can find a way to prevent this from happening with their case I would go with a different brand case. Now I’m stuck with this case and I had to order a different brand to protect my phone. I guess live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Case Looks Good, But One of my chargers Did not Fit
customer_reviews.text: The case looks very nice. However, I would give it a 5 stars if one of my chargers with a wider head was able to fit in the socket. It was too small. I have to take my case off in order to charge it. It fits apple chargers. Also, if I unplug the charger and ear jack covers, I’m afraid that it might tear off because it is made out rubber. My previous Lifetime case’s covers were made out of plastic that were sturdier than the rubber. I was able to unscrew the cover for the ear jack that seemed more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Chai

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars on the fingerprint part because it's not used. It seems good so far. I wish it was a bit more sturdy but it will do. It's for my mom so she wont be doing anything too crazy with her phone. I loved how easy it was to put on the phone. Great price. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: charge hole not big enough
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've had. Living in Alaska and around beaches and boating it has probably saved my phone more times than I know. The major drawback I have found ,is that there are few charge cords that will fit into the port as it is too tight to receive the cord shoulders. I lost the one that I just lucked out to find that fit and have bought tons of cords to try and replace it. I now continue my search but in the meantime have to open the case every night....a major hassle. It would be perfect if the hole could be a bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with the case, seems fine in all the ways I would want. However, I immediately noticed that several aftermarket charging cords do not fit through the case opening, as it is slightly too small. This is highly annoying, but my work around is to use a Dremel tool to sand down relevant cord ends until they fit. This seems like a basic design oversight, and not all people would be willing to go to this length.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Poor tab design...
customer_reviews.text: Item held up through 2 years of hard use. Screen still worked fine despite scratches, burns, and plenty of drops in the dirt. The only reason I needed a new case was because I couldn’t open the flap on the charging port anymore. The tab broke off on it finally! The case was still waterproof, and everything worked fine. I just need to use a loop of dental floss to get the tab opened...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays water proof
customer_reviews.text: Screen scratches very easily but stays very water proof (took mine snorkeling for hours.) Also people on the other end of my phone calls have a hard time hearing me with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with any power cord but Apple
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof aspect was not a necessity. but I thought for the price it would be a nice advantage to have. None of my power cords, except iPhone one, worked. They just don't fit into the phone when the case is on. I have one cord for the car; a long one that I take on trips since you never know how close the outlet is to bedside or sofa; and one in my briefcase. I would have had to replace all of them . . . and Apple products aren't cheap! I returned it. No problem with return. Customer service appears to be good. And case worked with touch aspect fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Runyon

customer_reviews.title: Great case but no one can hear you on a call
customer_reviews.text: Update: Raised the review to 4 of 5 since they have excellent customer service and reached out about the issue of call quality and offered a refund. They did say they changed manufactures which hopefully address that. Case is excellent against the elements so overall pleased. Giving is 3 out of 5 mainly because I either have to have the phone on speaker or have it hooked up to a Bluetooth device in order for anyone to hear me on a call. Considering returning it because of that but I do love the case besides that. I can hear others alright but no one can every hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine MGL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compared to competitor
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Instructions were clear, waterproof test worked. Really like the feel of my iPhone in this case. Grip is nice, ports more durable than previous brand (lifeproof) and touchscreen is more responsive. Case seems durable, but haven’t dropped phone since using Ounne case. Delivered on time with customer service follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with my new OUNNE waterproof phone case. It is light weight and appears to function as advertised. Instructions recommend doing an underwater pretest before installing phone. It works! The case is very difficult to open which I’m sure is necessary for integrity of product. This will prevent me periodically testing as recommended. I do feel this case will hold up to my expectations. I also appreciate customer service info included with packaging and follow up email. Product arrived in less than 36 hours in perfect condition. One of the handiest things is being able to wash in the dish sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case couple complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to replace his otterbox. So far he said he likes it but the charging port is small so any thicker cords don’t work with it. Also he has to remove the bottom part of it while on the phone or nobody can hear him. It like blocks the speaker
customer_reviews.author: alyssa michelle pepe

customer_reviews.title: Case won’t accept aftermarket charging cables
customer_reviews.text: The phone fit well, nice and tight, and the case sealed up tightly. I was confident it was dust and water proof. I liked the fact that I read my existing screen protector could stay on my phone, giving “double” protection. However, the case would only accept the Apple’s original iPhone charging cable. Unless I removed my phone from its case, I couldn’t charge it I’m my car, shop, or charging station. Also, only the supplied 3.5mm adapter cable would fit in the headphone hole. The screen protector is not flat or ridged and reflect wavy image in certain light.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hill

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fit our iphone 6
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a much-loved case - put this one on after ordering for iphone 6 but it didn't fit correctly. It was off the center of the camera and the control button was a little misplaced. We wanted to love it. Sending it back this week. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Renekade

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are very hard to press with this case!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of force to press the buttons with this case on the phone! The buttons on the case aren’t lined up or the plastic is too hard. Very annoying. I bought this case in August. The little rotary switch that operated the mute button fell out in March - 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sara G Pleace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t add much size to the phone
customer_reviews.text: Case so far is as advertised. I have done the water test and it passed with flying colors. I do not find the tabs hard to open, and they seem to seal well. I have dropped it twice, only had it a few days, and no problems. My only note is that it tends to “take on air” when the tabs are open so it doesn’t recognize my thumbprint. Simple solution is do a rub down with the ports open to get rid of the air and the problem is solved. Love that it fits easily in my back pocket, hardly adds any weight/breadth to the phone itself and protects it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Plantlady

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough. A few Issues that aren't major.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy case. I've dropped it a few times and the case has worked great. Never tried submerging it in water, so no clue if truly waterproof. There are a few problems with it: the fingerprint reader works only about 30-40% of the time, the case is impossible to get off, the plastic on the front and back is slippery because it's so smooth, it makes it hard to hold, and the hole in the case for headphone jack is too small for most headphones to reach the phone. Besides these, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case. I bought a different one before this and it was tacky: the buttons didn’t work and the sound was really muffled. That’s not the case with this one. This case is very stylish and sleek, got a ton of complements when i put it on. They didn’t believe it was a waterproof case after hearing the sound quality. You can’t go wrong with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this for about a week. I like the feel and so far all buttons working fine. Can’t comment on the effectiveness of dropping phone or waterproof as I’m certainly not ready to test it!! Will update review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been holding off getting a waterproof case but finally pulled the trigger on the OUNNE as it is slim but durable and keeps the water away from my phone! So far it has worked perfectly (a few test runs in the pool). The wrist strap is a nice addition also! Great product and it ships quickly with excellent instructions! Thank you OUNNE!!
customer_reviews.author: shelly shisler, allied property services, inc

customer_reviews.title: Leaked at port openings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to take on my honeymoon and use snorkeling. I was doing the paper test as suggested by the manual (placing a piece of paper in the case and putting the case under water to see if paper got wet). The paper got wet everytime I tried to do this. One of the port plugs would come slightly undone and allow water. Did not want to risk using this with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Glen R. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Bargin and nearly as good as the best of the best Protective cases.....just replaced my 5 yr old Ounne with a new one The best cases deterred with sun and sunscreen exposure in a few years also but cost 4/5 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike wilbur

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: good price. but i dont feel its strong for a regular fall. idk. i have a iphone 5 that has otterbox. and bc the iphone 6 is so old this.is the best i can get. all i need is a stronger protector even tho this is a wifi only phone
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great case
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very nice phone case! I was a little leery based on other reviews but I was pleasantly surprised with this case. I have had it a few months & have had no issues. This case is just as good as the Lifeproof case at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: DragonMaddie08

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this case for my husband and he absolutely loves it. He is ruff on his cases and this case still looks new. I highly recommend purchasing, we ordered it in black and it looks great! We tested it under water and had the music going- never skipped a beat. Defiantly worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Butram

customer_reviews.title: Water proof is good, scratched easily
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof feature is solid and I dropped the phone many times and it was fine because of the case Fingerprint thing works good If your screen is wet then it’s hard to use the touch screen feature of an smart phone Also the case gets scratched easily
customer_reviews.author: desmond5

customer_reviews.title: OK but Not Great
customer_reviews.text: The case is slim and easy to hold; however the design did not work too well, especially the Ringer On/Off button that I use every day to silence my phone at work/movies/etc was nearly impossible to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Forward Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my iphone before going on a beach vacation. It was great! It protected my phone from the sand and worked amazing under water. My pictures came out beautifully! I really liked having the small teether attached so I wasn't worried about losing my grip with wet hands. My only word of caution is that my 'after market' charger did not fit my phone with the case on. However, the iPhone charger works just fine. Just something to think about. I would still recommend this case 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Pellerin

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this !!!
customer_reviews.text: bought the black one. wish I hadn't ,then was really glad I did. looks smart,& screen looks great.Never used this company before,but everything seems on the up & up. don't regret this purchase at all..!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was actually really surprised at the quality of the case. I have had numerous life proof cases and so far I would say the Ounne case is at least as good if not better. The only thing that is a little odd for me is the knob to switch from ring to silent. It is a little hard to use until you get the hang of it but at least it stays where you put it until you change it again. Time will tell as to how it holds up but I am very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like it okay but the front cover smears and scuff easier than my previous Lifeproof case. The fingerprint reader seems to be better in this brand. The case is more difficult to remove than Lifeproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet n' Sassy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: wish the screen fit a bit better
customer_reviews.text: The screen needs to be slightly more recessed within the top case to avoid pushback. It's annoying, but it works. Have not tested the durability other than my son dropped it a couple of times already and it didn't hurt the phone. So, that is a positive I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and still has good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Ounne waterproof case we have purchased from this seller. Great service and terrific product. Both my husband’ and i’s phones are well protected now and we are really happy we switched from the Otterbox defender case to these Ounne ones
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Melp

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 6/6s case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case. I live a very active life, so my first case was dropped on rocks, submerged in water and still lasted a long time. The price is good, the service fast, and I’m very satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly durable case at a great price, but not all charger cables fit the port
customer_reviews.text: The case delivers on all of its promises - waterproof, sandproof, and capable of taking a beating (I accidentally dropped it in such a way that it fell down every stair on my apartment staircase, and there wasn't even a scratch on the case) - and at a low price to boot! The only real complaint I have is that most third-party power cables will not fit into the small hole at the bottom of the case provided for accessing the charger port. That said, the case came with a voucher for free cables from OUNNE, so they've gone the extra mile to make their customers happy!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Aftermarket power cord may not fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these cases on my iPhone for a few years, and I’ve been very happy with it. However, I needed to replace the case because the cover over the home button wore out. Unfortunately, Ounne modified the case and my aftermarket charging cords no longer fit in the case hole. The Apple cords fit, but anything large does not.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Baby proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case simply so my baby can play with my phone and I wouldn’t have to worry about him breaking it. So far, it’s been great! It’s been chewed on, slobbered on, thrown, beaten on the floor, and my phone is still in the same condition it was before I bought the case!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions
customer_reviews.text: After 1 day of using the case, it feels durable, buttons are slightly more stiff to press and use than I'd prefer, getting the case on and off is difficult (I'm curious to see if the case will warp and the seal become less stiff as time goes on), accessibility to the edges of the screen are a little more challenging since there is slight gapping between the cover and the phone itself (requiring a few tries to click buttons at the very edge). Overall, seems like a durable product but I wish it was easier to take on and off the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The case seems very well made and was very easy to put on my husband ‘s phone. At this time I cannot rate the durability as he just started using it but I am very hopeful. My husband fishes a lot and has dropped two phones in the river so far. His last phone had an otter box case which was suppose to be waterproof but it was not. Water got in the case and ruined his phone. Fingers crossed this one will be better. I will write an update if he has another incident.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprints reader not good
customer_reviews.text: Case very nice and nice strap to hold it. Seal water out very well. Fingerprints reader worked partially ok on first day and second day it does no recognize the fingerprints any longer. I will have to dispose it after this trip and enter password every time for the next 10 days....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: only ok
customer_reviews.text: I had this about 5 months before the rotating piece for the ringer button just fell off one day - whatever held it on just snapped off. The case itself was very durable and saved my phone from the many drops to the ground and kept my phone safe in water. However, the earphone jack isn't big enough to plug in a chord so that was inconvenient. The fingerprint worked but it often took more than one try. I also got complaints about people saying I was muffled and hard to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone case delivers exactly as it promises. It is quite durable. It lasted about six months with a very outdoors job surrounded by water. I dropped it a lot and it fell in water. Zero damage to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with texting
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof as advertised but had a lot of trouble texting with it. Screen just wasn’t sensitive enough. Sending it back. 😕
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: This will not work with a charger....
customer_reviews.text: I have to return this because my charger doesn't work with it. Also, the volume buttons don't work without really jamming them down.
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and he cannot use it. Whenever he puts his iPhone in the case, it automatically goes to mute. He has tried over and over, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Using the phone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am returning the case. With the case around the phone my voice sounds as if I were in a drum. My head phone jack will not work and working the help button is sometimes difficult. I believe this all because of the waterproof features. Having a water proof or yelling at my phones just seems to be to much of a downside. I’m
customer_reviews.author: Harry Shute

customer_reviews.title: Me proof case.
customer_reviews.text: Have already dropped the phone once and it just bounced. Seems to be a good case for me since I was replacing screens monthly. Since I got this case I haven’t had to replace a screen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ross

customer_reviews.title: Water damage -
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before buying this case. I planned to take my phone snorkeling. I tested it twice before going out to the beach and it was fine and dry. Once I took it snorkeling, I noticed water leaking in almost immediately. All of the seals were closed and it seemed to be secure. I'm glad it worked for some people, but it unfortunately did not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t open the case!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it a two was that I did the water test, it passed the test but then I couldn’t get the darn case open again to put my phone in it! I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: JQbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great except charge pot hole small
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s water resistant, which is great for us who work on and in the water all the time. The charging port hole is too small for heavy duty chargers though
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: USB Plug Opens/Case Hard to Open
customer_reviews.text: I tested it before using and it passed! However, it’s VERY hard to open. Which is great for protection from water but not when you want your phone out. I finally was able to use it at a pool but I noticed the plug for the USB port kept slowly popping out. No matter how many times I closed it, it popped out again. THANKFULLY I never had it in water so I cannot comment further than the test I did. I’m sure it works... if the USB plug stays closed.
customer_reviews.author: W Family

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for approximately one week and it has already survived a 5 foot fall onto concrete and being dropped in my hot tub. So, in my opinion this phone case has already proven itself worth the money. The screen is as clear as can be, the fingerprint reader works like there’s not even a case on it and the case is so thin I can carry it in my pockets no problem. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Can't get the case open after closing
customer_reviews.text: Once closed for water testing I could not reopen this case (yes I tried a coin, I tried everything). Also the headphone insert cover is ribbed with plastic to provide better grip bit instead it just hurts to open. To be fair I couldn't get that open either. Very frustrating. Especially since I left on a long trip right after receiving so couldn't return.
customer_reviews.author: Allie B.

customer_reviews.title: All in all great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: The case for the 6S fits great other than the right side button doesn’t seem to lineup perfect so it is hard to press. My ounne case for iPhone X fit perfectly and is very durable
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: No leaking
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the waterproof claim before putting my phone in this case, and it worked beautifully. It was easy to open and shut the case, which is important to me. It seems to be a high quality case which should be very durable. I am happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Honstead

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m pretty pleased with this case. Lightweight and slim. I really like the turn-knob on the mute switch. And the look and feel of the case are good. Did the submersion test and the seal was good. Not very optimistic about the flaps covering the power and headphone ports holding up, but we will see. For the price I am satisfied. I’ve gone through two similar cases from a competitor in about 3 years. If this one holds up as long for half the price, it’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Holston

customer_reviews.title: Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: Great case for keeping your phone safe from water & hitting hard surfaces for sure. But I couldn’t fit my headphone cable in without taking the case off. You’d definitely need to buy a headphone jack adapter if you consider this case. Also, a lot of people had a hard time hearing me on the phone whenever I had it on. They said I sounded far away. Needless to say, I took it off. It was annoying taking it on and off whenever I had a call.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: All around great case.
customer_reviews.text: I did the water test after getting the case, it passed. Installing the phone was easy and a perfect fit. I’ve dropped the phone a few times already and there was no damage or scratches. The case is comfortable to hold, looks and feels good, and I really appreciate the wrist strap. I haven’t experienced the phone getting wet or in water yet but if that happens I’ll add an edit to this review. I don’t notice any muffling of the sound, and all of the buttons are easy to press, and the charging port plug works as it’s supposed to. This Seems to be all around a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Protection.
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone constantly, personal problem. This case keeps it safe and in working order. The only drawback for me is the mute switch is difficult for me to operate with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian McDow

customer_reviews.title: Poor fitting not durable
customer_reviews.text: Seemed ok at first but then I realized the case was a bit loose because typing was hard and if I squeeze gently the screen protector buckles so you can tell the case is a bit big but. I continued to use it then after a few months the lighting cable port protector fell off as well as the home button protection. I’ve had the case for about 6 months and I’m now already looking for a replacement. So overall I’d say I’d give it about 2 stars. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Camera can not be used with this case
customer_reviews.text: It fits my phone perfectly but doesn’t line up with my phones camera so I can not take any pictures (except selfies) while the case is on. I teach swim lessons so this case is good for the purpose that I didn’t want to get my phone wet but after lessons it has to be taken out because I love taking pictures of my 4 kids and it’s impossible with this case
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof case!
customer_reviews.text: An ideal case to protect my iPhone from water, dust, & falls. This is well constructed. It was easy to install & is waterproof. I followed the directions for the waterproof test prior to installing my phone, the case does not leak!! The touch screen works better now than before. It is very well designed. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.text: Touch screen is not good. Everything else is excellent .
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mohamed Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Case is very nice, beter than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything I don't like. I'm realistic about it being totally waterproof so if it every gets really wet hopefully my phone will survive. Had an Otterbox before and this is just as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the look of this case. Great quality and not too bulky. People found it very difficult to hear me on phone calls and I couldn’t find an aux cord or adaptor that could reach through the case. I don’t have Bluetooth in my car so I wasn’t able to play music or podcasts while driving. Phone calls through airpods we’re fine!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

product_meta.title: OUNNE iPhone 6/6s Waterproof Case, IP68 Certified with Touch ID Underwater Full Body Cover SandProof Shockproof Snowproof for iPhone 6/6s (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Compatibility 
OUNNE iPhone 6/6S waterproof case (4.7 inch) 

Product Features 
√ The case is light-weight, easy to carry and won't affect the daily use. It also protects your iPhone 6/6s touchscreen from scratches, marks, and scrapes. 
√ Works well with camera and takes photos, special sound enhancement system has improved. 

Notes 
1. Before installing the mobile phone, please try to waterproof case , into the water, if will not leak, again to install mobile phone; 
2. Please correct installation to mobile phone protection shell; Make sure all the hole and thin seam sealed tight. 
3. Please do not stick Temper Glass Screen Protector for your phone when using this waterproof case. 

Packing included: 
1 x OUNNE Waterproof Case for iPhone 6/6S 
1 x Lanyard 
1 x Cleaning Cloth 
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: 【iP68 WATERPROOF】 Waterproof grade up to 6.6ft for 30 minutes, perfect protection for any underwater activities or outdoor sports.
【SHOCKPROOF】 Provide full protection with durable TPU material , withstands drops from 4 ft height. Fully protect your iPhone 6/6s in all environments.
【EASY INSTALLATION 】Fully sealed even after repeatedly open and close. Double cover snap on design makes it fast and easy to install or take off in seconds.
【FULL PROTECTION】 Protect your iPhone from damaging by water splashes and sand getting in cracks and crevices, scratchproof mobile phone covers.
【HIGH-QUALITY】With clear built-in screen protector&scratch resistant back panel,shock absorb, anti-scratch, dustproof and anti-slip without compromising sensitivity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,447 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
